title: Mohsin Naqvi expresses sorrow over tragic death of Murad Sadpara
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 12 (APP): Federal Minister for Interior Mohsin Naqvi has expressed deep sorrow over the death of renowned mountaineer Murad Sadpara.
He extended heartfelt condolences and sympathies to the family of Murad Sadpara. He paid rich tribute to Murad Sadparaâ€™s services to mountaineering, saying that his bravery and sacrifice will never be forgotten.
Mohsin Naqvi said that Murad Sadpara risked his life to rescue stranded mountaineers. He prayed for the high ranks of Murad Sadpara in the hereafter and patience for his family to bear this irreparable loss.
